name: Curve HBTC Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains WBTC and HBTC, a tokenized BTC custodied by Huobi.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains WBTC and HBTC, a tokenized BTC custodied by Huobi.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, Huobi tarafından saklanan tokenize edilmiş bir BTC olan WBTC ve HBTC'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains WBTC and HBTC, a tokenized BTC custodied by Huobi.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 WBTC 和由火币发行的托管式比特币 HBTC。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस पूल में WBTC और HBTC शामिल हैं, जो Huobi द्वारा संरक्षित एक टोकनयुक्त BTC है।
